        public static InLocoMediaOptions getInstance(android.content.Context context)

public void setDevelopmentEnvironment(boolean enabled)
        Deprecated. 
        Enable the sdk development mode.

        Now this method is deprecated, use setDevelopmentDevices(String...) instead of it.

        Parameters:

        See Also:
